section.heading: Green building priority.
section.text: Priority consideration for the District government's facility needs shall be given to buildings maintaining net zero energy compliance and to buildings fulfilling or exceeding the LEED-NC 2.2 standard or the LEED-CS 2.0 standard at the silver level.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 1007 of Fiscal Year 2012 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2011 (D.C. Act 19-93, June 29, 2011, 58 DCR 5599).

Applicability of D.C. Law 24-306: § 4 of D.C. Law 24-306 provided that the change made to this section by § 3(b) of D.C. Law 24-306 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

Section 7091 of D.C. Law 25-50 repealed section 4 of D.C. Law 24-306 removing the applicability provision impacting this section. Therefore the amendment of this section by section 3(b) of Law 24-306 has been implemented.
